summary: An Ordinance amending Sections 1 and 3 of Ordinance No. 21629 entitled: "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, extending, widening, altering and establishing of Phinney Avenue, from the north line of the supplemental plat of Woodland Park to Windell's Division of Green Lake Addition, all in The City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law." approved August 11, 1909.
